data.text: @SandraWeeden Could this be the way the Government are pushing things? They’re always defunding the NHS in a round about way…it’s been their plan all the way along….just needed “the proof” 😡😡😡
@SandraWeeden And pre existing conditions aren't generally covered. I'm older so it's probably easier for an insurance company to list what is covered!
@SandraWeeden Myself being one of them. £952 lighter, however I can't afford the operation privately. 😢

@SandraWeeden Everyone is praising the NHS but is worse than in poor countries. At least in my home country,  Romania, we know public health care is v bad, so we go private. But private is affordable there.  Even now, when we have a problem, we just fly there.

@SandraWeeden I had to go private at the beginning of last year because I was turned away from A&E after receiving no tests or examination, just a quick chat with a "barely able to speak English" registrar, who said she didn't know what the problem was but it wasn't serious so don't worry. 🤬
@SandraWeeden Funnily enough I asked my dentist about this years ago when he changed to private 😉. He looked at me and said “you should be so lucky “ 👍
